verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against רוֹעֵ֣י <WH7462> ro-'Ei against the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֩ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֨ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to לָרֹעִ֜ים <WH7462> la-ro-'Im unto the shepherds כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD ה֤וֹי <WH1945> Ho Woe רֹעֵֽי־ <WH7462> ro-'ei- [be] to the shepherds יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הָיוּ֙ <WH1961> ha-Yu have been רֹעִ֣ים <WH7462> ro-'Im that do feed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo not הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon, cattle יִרְע֖וּ <WH7462> yir-'U themselves should not the shepherds הָרֹעִֽים׃ <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im. feed

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֵ֤לֶב <WH2459> ha-Che-lev the fat תֹּאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <WH398> to-Che-lu Ye eat וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַצֶּ֣מֶר <WH6785> hatz-Tze-mer you with the wool תִּלְבָּ֔שׁוּ <WH3847> til-Ba-shu, and ye clothe הַבְּרִיאָ֖ה <WH1277> hab-be-ri-'Ah them that are fed תִּזְבָּ֑חוּ <WH2076> tiz-Ba-chu; ye kill הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon not the flock לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo without תִרְעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> tir-'U. [but] ye feed

אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנַּחְלוֹת֩ <WH2470> han-nach-lOt The diseased לֹ֨א <WH3808> lo nor חִזַּקְתֶּ֜ם <WH2388> chiz-zak-Tem have ye not strengthened וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחוֹלָ֣ה <WH2470> ha-cho-Lah that which was sick לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor רִפֵּאתֶ֗ם <WH7495> rip-pe-Tem, neither have ye healed וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֙רֶת֙ <WH7665> ve-lan-nish-Be-ret [that which was] broken לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor חֲבַשְׁתֶּ֔ם <WH2280> cha-vash-Tem, neither have ye bound up וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנִּדַּ֙חַת֙ <WH5080> han-nid-Da-chat that which was driven away לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֔ם <WH7725> ha-she-vo-Tem, neither have ye brought again וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאֹבֶ֖דֶת <WH6> ha-'o-Ve-det that which was lost לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor בִקַּשְׁתֶּ֑ם <WH1245> vik-kash-Tem; neither have ye sought וּבְחָזְקָ֛ה <WH2394> u-ve-cha-ze-Kah but with force רְדִיתֶ֥ם <WH7287> re-di-Tem have ye ruled אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam וּבְפָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH6531> u-ve-Fa-rech. and with cruelty

וַתְּפוּצֶ֖ינָה <WH6327> vat-te-fu-Tzei-nah And they were scattered מִבְּלִ֣י <WH1097> mib-be-Li lack רֹעֶ֑ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh; because [there is] no shepherd וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <WH1961> vat-tih-Yei-nah became לְאָכְלָ֛ה <WH402> le-'och-Lah and they became meat לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol every חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> chai-Yat to all the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of the field וַתְּפוּצֶֽינָה׃ <WH6327> vat-te-fu-Tzei-nah. when they were scattered

יִשְׁגּ֤וּ <WH7686> yish-Gu wandered צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> tzo-Ni My sheep בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim, through all the mountains וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every גִּבְעָ֣ה <WH1389> giv-'Ah hill רָמָ֑ה <WH7311> ra-Mah; and upon every high וְעַ֨ל <WH5921> ve-'Al over כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon all the face הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the earth נָפֹ֣צוּ <WH6327> na-Fo-tzu was scattered צֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> tzo-Ni, yea my flock וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there דּוֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> do-Resh and none did search וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein was no מְבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> me-vak-Kesh. or seek

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore רֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> ro-'Im, Therefore ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U hear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> de-Var the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

חַי־ <WH2416> chai- [As] I live אָ֜נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I נְאֻ֣ם׀ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an because הֱיֽוֹת־ <WH1961> he-yot- has become צֹאנִ֣י׀ <WH6629> tzo-Ni surely because my flock לָבַ֡ז <WH957> la-Vaz became a prey וַתִּֽהְיֶינָה֩ <WH1961> vat-tih-yei-Nah become צֹאנִ֨י <WH6629> tzo-Ni and my flock לְאָכְלָ֜ה <WH402> le-'och-Lah became meat לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> chai-Yat to every beast הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of the field מֵאֵ֣ין <WH369> me-'Ein lack רֹעֶ֔ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh, because [there was] no shepherd וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not דָרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1875> da-re-Shu search רֹעַ֖י <WH7462> ro-'Ai neither did my shepherds אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנִ֑י <WH6629> tzo-Ni; for my flock וַיִּרְע֤וּ <WH7462> vai-yir-'U but the shepherds הָֽרֹעִים֙ <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im fed אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et צֹאנִ֖י <WH6629> tzo-Ni not my flock לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo and did not רָעֽוּ׃ <WH7462> ra-'U. themselves and fed ס sa-Mek
לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הָֽרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im, Therefore O ye shepherds שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- I am against הָרֹעִ֜ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im Behold I [am] against the shepherds וְֽדָרַשְׁתִּ֧י <WH1875> ve-da-rash-Ti and I will require אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנִ֣י <WH6629> tzo-Ni my flock מִיָּדָ֗ם <WH3027> mi-ya-Dam, at their hand וְהִשְׁבַּתִּים֙ <WH7673> ve-hish-bat-Tim and cause them to cease מֵרְע֣וֹת <WH7462> me-re-'ot from feeding צֹ֔אן <WH6629> Tzon, the flock וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not יִרְע֥וּ <WH7462> yir-'U neither shall the shepherds ע֛וֹד <WH5750> od anymore הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im feed אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> o-Tam; וְהִצַּלְתִּ֤י <WH5337> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti themselves any more for I will deliver צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> tzo-Ni my flock מִפִּיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> mip-pi-Hem, from their mouth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not תִהְיֶ֥יןָ <WH1961> tih-Yei-na become לָהֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Hem לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> le-'och-Lah that they may not be meat ס sa-Mek

כִּ֛י <WH3588> ki For כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִי־ <WH2005> hin-ni- behold אָ֕נִי <WH589> 'A-ni Myself וְדָרַשְׁתִּ֥י <WH1875> ve-da-rash-Ti Behold I [even] I will both search אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנִ֖י <WH6629> tzo-Ni my sheep וּבִקַּרְתִּֽים׃ <WH1239> u-vik-kar-Tim. and seek them out

כְּבַקָּרַת֩ <WH1243> ke-vak-ka-Rat seeketh out רֹעֶ֨ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh As a shepherd עֶדְר֜וֹ <WH5739> ed-Ro his flock בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> be-yom- in the day הֱיוֹת֤וֹ <WH1961> he-yo-To become בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> ve-toch- that he is among צֹאנוֹ֙ <WH6629> tzo-No his sheep נִפְרָשׁ֔וֹת <WH6567> nif-ra-Shot, [that are] scattered כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> ken so אֲבַקֵּ֣ר <WH1239> 'a-vak-Ker so will I seek out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנִ֑י <WH6629> tzo-Ni; my sheep וְהִצַּלְתִּ֣י <WH5337> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti and will deliver אֶתְהֶ֗ם <WH853> 'et-Hem, מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <WH4725> ham-me-ko-Mot them out of all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to which נָפֹ֣צוּ <WH6327> na-Fo-tzu where they have been scattered שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, in it בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day עָנָ֖ן <WH6051> 'a-Nan in the cloudy וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> va-'a-ra-Fel. and dark

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣ים <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Tim And I will bring them out מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּים֙ <WH6908> ve-kib-batz-Tim and gather מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot, them from the countries וַהֲבִיאֹתִ֖ים <WH935> va-ha-vi-'o-Tim and will bring אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַדְמָתָ֑ם <WH127> 'ad-ma-Tam; them to their own land וּרְעִיתִים֙ <WH7462> u-re-'i-Tim and feed אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> ha-Rei them upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בָּאֲפִיקִ֕ים <WH650> ba-'a-fi-Kim by the rivers וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all מוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH4186> mo-she-Vei and in all the inhabited places הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the country

בְּמִרְעֶה־ <WH4829> be-mir-'eh- pasture טּוֹב֙ <WH2896> tOv them in a good אֶרְעֶ֣ה <WH7462> 'er-'Eh I will feed אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, וּבְהָרֵ֥י <WH2022> u-ve-ha-Rei mountains מְרֽוֹם־ <WH4791> me-rom- and upon the high יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become נְוֵהֶ֑ם <WH5116> ne-ve-Hem; shall their fold שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> sham There תִּרְבַּ֙צְנָה֙ <WH7257> tir-Batz-nah be there shall they lie בְּנָ֣וֶה <WH5116> be-Na-veh fold טּ֔וֹב <WH2896> Tov, in a good וּמִרְעֶ֥ה <WH4829> u-mir-'Eh pasture שָׁמֵ֛ן <WH8082> sha-Men and [in] a fat תִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <WH7462> tir-'Ei-nah shall they feed אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> ha-Rei upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

אֲנִ֨י <WH589> 'a-Ni I אֶרְעֶ֤ה <WH7462> 'er-'Eh I will feed צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> tzo-Ni my flock וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> va-'a-Ni and I אַרְבִּיצֵ֔ם <WH7257> 'ar-bi-Tzem, and I will cause them to lie down נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֹבֶ֤דֶת <WH6> ha-'o-Ve-det that which was lost אֲבַקֵּשׁ֙ <WH1245> 'a-vak-Kesh I will seek וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנִּדַּ֣חַת <WH5080> han-nid-Da-chat that which was driven away אָשִׁ֔יב <WH7725> 'a-Shiv, and bring again וְלַנִּשְׁבֶּ֣רֶת <WH7665> ve-lan-nish-Be-ret [that which was] broken אֶחֱבֹ֔שׁ <WH2280> 'e-che-Vosh, and will bind up וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחוֹלָ֖ה <WH2470> ha-cho-Lah that which was sick אֲחַזֵּ֑ק <WH2388> 'a-chaz-Zek; and will strengthen וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשְּׁמֵנָ֧ה <WH8082> hash-she-me-Nah the fat וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַחֲזָקָ֛ה <WH2389> ha-cha-za-Kah and the strong אַשְׁמִ֖יד <WH8045> 'ash-Mid but I will destroy אֶרְעֶ֥נָּה <WH7462> 'er-'En-nah I will feed בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> ve-mish-Pat. them with judgment

וְאַתֵּ֣נָה <WH859> ve-'at-Te-nah And [as for] you צֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> tzo-Ni, O my flock כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold שֹׁפֵט֙ <WH8199> sho-Fet Behold I judge בֵּֽין־ <WH996> bein- between שֶׂ֣ה <WH7716> seh between cattle לָשֶׂ֔ה <WH7716> la-Seh, and cattle לָאֵילִ֖ים <WH352> la-'ei-Lim between the rams וְלָעַתּוּדִֽים׃ <WH6260> ve-la-'at-tu-Dim. and the he goats

הַמְעַ֣ט <WH4592> ham-'At [Seemeth it] a small thing מִכֶּ֗ם <WH4480> mik-Kem, too הַמִּרְעֶ֤ה <WH4829> ham-mir-'Eh pasture הַטּוֹב֙ <WH2896> hat-tOv the good תִּרְע֔וּ <WH7462> tir-'U, unto you to have eaten up וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> ve-Ye-ter the residue מִרְעֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4829> mir-'ei-Chem, pasture תִּרְמְס֖וּ <WH7429> tir-me-Su but ye must tread down בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH7272> be-rag-lei-Chem; with your feet וּמִשְׁקַע־ <WH4950> u-mish-ka'- of the deep מַ֣יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters תִּשְׁתּ֔וּ <WH8354> tish-Tu, assuredly וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <WH3498> han-No-ta-Rim, the residue בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7272> be-rag-lei-Chem your feet תִּרְפֹּשֽׂוּן׃ <WH7515> tir-po-Sun. but ye must foul

וְצֹאנִ֑י <WH6629> ve-tzo-Ni; And [as for] my flock מִרְמַ֤ס <WH4823> mir-Mas that which ye have trodden רַגְלֵיכֶם֙ <WH7272> rag-lei-Chem with your feet תִּרְעֶ֔ינָה <WH7462> tir-'Ei-nah, they eat וּמִרְפַּ֥שׂ <WH4833> u-mir-Pas that which ye have fouled רַגְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7272> rag-lei-Chem with your feet תִּשְׁתֶּֽינָה׃ <WH8354> tish-Tei-nah. and they drink ס sa-Mek
